post.body: Yaahh! You're actually twittering :)
Adobe Air has a Pandora app
for $1700 bucks I'd rip the goal posts down too! lol
Thanks! Already looking like $1700 per person!! Looks like I may pass on that one http://tinyurl.com/6hxq5p
Blip is badass. Lets you create music playlists and then twitter them out! http://blip.fm/mattbennett
They're due tomorrow, but most of mine are already posted on BlackBoard
I'm glad you got it working!
Yeah man I've been liking what you've been posting about India. Keep it up
Flash is fine, but my Wacom tablet crashes constantly since I updated to 10.5.6
I use TwitterBerry and it rocks! I have a Storm and it doesn't work in landscape yet, but otherwise it's a solid program
don't use the automated tool. Create a shared calendar to sync both ways. I use it to sync my storm with my imac
Yeah we were. Sorry, it's been a crazy week. I'll get together with my team and figure out a time. I'll call you in a few days
Yeah, it is
Yeah. GSM is off and brightness is just a little over half. In all fairness I do use it a lot, but come one, this is ridiculous
I know you're in Eastern Montana, but whereabouts?
BB Storm Tip #1: Delete VZ Navigator and then do a battery pull. Soo much faster now! (Make sure you have the .75 update too)
just bought tickets to Girl Talk!
Headed to work... Just a few more days!
iMac has been on for three months straight DL-ing a pack of all James Bond movies. 40GB worth. Finished this morning. Now need to reboot!
was up till 4AM but finally got a two way wireless sync from iCal to my BB! iCal to Google to Google Sync to BB.... I feel accomplished!
finally getting iCal to sync w/ Google Calendar which hopefully will sync with my BlackBerry. God this is frustrating!
sorry.. someone got the password to my @mattb19us account. Creating a new one is the only thing I could do
Feel so refreshed after a real night of sleep!
Finally time to sleep
anyone know if there's a bus headed to Chattanooga next week??
My heart is actually pounding right now
Oh another turnover!
Great first half!
Yaahh!!
heading over to the mall to meet @cmanlove
BEST one hit wonder.. EVER!! ♫ http://blip.fm/~14k8t
You're cool, then I'm cool, then we're cool.... ♫ http://blip.fm/~14cqa
His voice is fantastic. Haven't heard anyone else who sounds like Jeff Gaines ♫ http://blip.fm/~14ci5
bought a new tea sampler today. Time to try out a cup of Moroccan orange spice and watch some Lost! #greatnight
just walked my dog until she threw up. I'm such a good poppa eh? :)
just set up a blip.fm account. Very cool service!
Wtf? Got out of the shower today and realized that I still had shampoo in my hair. Gonna be a hell of a day!
deleted my Myspace account last night. De-cluttering feels good!
One of the most insane DJ's I"ve heard! Got my tickets today to see him perform! ♫ http://blip.fm/~16xei
lets see if Twitter updates my Facebook status....
Uh oh... QVC cancelled my order for Wii Fit! I'm panicking now!!!!!!
Didn't want to be "that guy" this year, so I finished up all my Christmas shopping today!
NO!!!! http://tinyurl.com/6lvvqc
Why can't I seem to get to bed before 3 in the morning lately?
Whoa. 10.5.6 released. Downloading now!
New single from The Dream, and yeah, like the song says, he's rockin that! ♫ http://blip.fm/~15u2t
just watched Eagle Eye. Not too bad actually!
Great day so far: slept in, made an omelette, showered and shaved the beard off, watched the Jets game, now ready for some Lost! #lazyday
I bought a domain today, but don't know how to actually create a blog to publish on it. Can anyone give me some advice?
hmm lets see if I can import my Twitter stream into my Facebook news feed....
New up-and-comer from Brooklyn. Great stuff! ♫ http://blip.fm/~15494
Wow. Can't believe that it's been a year since Benazir Bhutto was assassinated. What an amazing woman she was http://bit.ly/v3el
Wow I really need to start going to bed earlier
She gives, I get, without giving anything to me... ♫ http://blip.fm/~1bcqw
grapefruit juice on ice... nothing better!
Wow. Death Race was terrible. Now on to Bourne Identity on Blu Ray!
Loving the Wii Fit!
Bangkok Dangerous was terrible. Now on to Death Race. (Yeah, I know, not exactly Christmas-ey movies...)
Movie marathon day. First up: Bangkok Dangerous
Fantastic holiday song. Super addicting! Merry Christmas everyone :) ♫ http://blip.fm/~1apot
just left cookies and milk out. Now time for bed....
Dad and I having champagne with blueberries. Delicious!
This is tremendous. Absolutely the best video I've seen this year! http://bit.ly/ySLj
BB Storm rapidly losing its appeal... down to 5% battery after just a single days use....
Spent the past few hours watching videos from Google Zeitgeist. Fascinating and very insightful! http://tinyurl.com/9kor4c
I've got to say that sleeping in is the single greatest thing for your health you could ever do..
Finally got a Wii Fit today!
I'll bet it's a quiet plane ride back to Montana for the team tomorrow...
